node.html:
• Designing and Implementing a RISCV Core with OpenOCD flow,
  • Integrating Mask_Generation and Mask_Decompression modules with the RISCV Core using AXI bridge.
  • Completed a Continuous Integration flow for the Mask_gen module.
  • Completed an Automatic Documentation engine for the project.
• Developed Image-based-rendering based Reinforcement learning environment for end-to-end training to avoid sim2real, domain adaptation or domain randomization etc using CUDA and OpenGL

• Completed RTL of GPS Baseband Engine (Digital)IC.
  • Completed Layout of Temperature Sensor (Analog)IC.
